page.title: 05May Day - Ditton School
page.content: Every Year on May the first we celebrate May Day. On May Day we have a May Pole on the village green in front of the church. The top of the May Pole is decorated with paper flowers. 16 children dance round the May Pole, they all carry a ribbon. Each year we have a May Queen, this year Fiona Hooper was the Queen. We dance Country Dances round the May Pole. This year Catherine Holmes, Nicola Roberts and I played the recorder to the May Queen. The fourth year pupils do Morris and Sword Dancing and we all have a very happy time. Elizabeth - aged 9.
